data.title: Maps & Parking
data.text:
We have 3 locations where students can park and lock up their bikes and scooters. More racks are being added to accommodate the demand!

Watch this video to learn about a small lot near the Stadium which is designated for staff only. This is also our bus drop-off/pick-up location.

Watch this video to learn about the largest parking lot we have which is reserved for the permited students. We also have our designated Visitor and Handicap parking here. Visitor parking spaces are limited to only those who need to conduct business on campus - not used for student pick-up/drop-off.
